This repository contains the code used to build my personal website, available
at [jcha1997.github.io](https://jcha1997.github.io) or 
[jeremiahcha.com](https://www.jeremiahcha.com). 

### Acknowledgements

The website is built off the [minimal theme](https://github.com/orderedlist/minimal)
created by Steve Smith. Content was inspired by [\@emmaremy](https://github.com/emmaremy)
and [\@sonoshah](https://github.com/sonoshah). Design elements can be attributed to
[Brad Bolman](http://brad.bolman.com/) and [Andrea](https://a-flair.com/portfolio). 

### Troubleshooting

If you have any trouble with accessing my website, please feel free to file an 
[issue](https://github.com/jcha1997/jcha1997.github.io/issues) or send an email.
